content.title: UI for Recipients Form
content.body:
1. From the left of the Iris canvas, navigate to the Default Library.
  2. Click the search icon.
  3. In the search bar that appears, enter RecipientList.
  4. From the results, under RecipientsMobile, select RecipientList.
  5. Drag the RecipientsList collection onto the frmRecipients form on the canvas.
  6. From the top of the Iris canvas, select the Design tab to open the application in the Design view.
